name: GhostParty
description:
Speed run , catch and protect all the ghosts you can before the Devil find you !

You have a limited time to find and bring all the ghost you can to the party. At the end of the time the devil will find you and you will have to make a pact.

There are different ways to try and get a top score, using teleportation, crown sacrifice and keys... i let you find your way to play it !

Enjoy !
